name: bonnaroo-2010-presale-itll-be-here-before-you-know-it
title: Bonnaroo 2010 Presale: It’ll Be Here Before You Know It
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Bonnaroo is one of those things that you can hardly finish talking about before you have to start talking about it again. The 2010 festival dates have just been announced, and ticket presales will start next Friday, November 27 at 11am CST.

Bonnaroo 2010 will happen June 10-13, and if you get in on the holiday presale, your ticket will only run $209.50 instead of the $249.50 that those noncommittal friends of yours will end up shelling out later. The cheap tickets are available in limited increments and increase in price until they reach $249.50, or until the presale ends on December 31.

tl;dr: Buy your tickets as soon as they go on sale to get the cheapest price. Click here for ticket information and a purchase link.

Hat tip to Nashville Is Talking and @Bonnaroo for the heads up.

Photo by kloppster.
